title: Product Pulse: November 17-23, 2025
overview: This week's pulse identifies critical issues with app stability, causing login failures and feature inaccessibility. Payments experienced challenges with non-functional Autopay and extended withdrawal times for urgent needs. While overall UI/UX is praised, a specific drag-and-drop flaw led to missed trades, indicating areas for focused improvement.

themes.name: Slow, Glitches
themes.summary: Users reported significant app instability and login failures, severely hindering access to features like Digi Gold investment for multiple days.

themes.name: UI/UX
themes.summary: Though generally user-friendly, a critical flaw in the drag-and-drop system is causing users to miss trades due to required manual input.

themes.name: Payments/Statements
themes.summary: Critical payment functionalities are failing, with Autopay repeatedly unsuccessful and withdrawal processing times deemed excessively long during urgent situations.

quotes: Not working since last 5 days (Slow, Glitches)
pls update drag and drop system in target and stop manual type karne jaye hai to trade miss ho jata hai (UI/UX)
Withdrawal time is too long, It's an emergency right now and we have to wait for 4 days.ðŸ˜¡ (Payments/Statements)
actions: Prioritize investigation and resolution of core app stability, login failures, and feature accessibility (e.g., Digi Gold).
Enhance the drag-and-drop trading interface to prevent manual input errors and ensure trade execution without delays.
Address Autopay functionality failures and optimize withdrawal processing times to meet user expectations, especially for urgent needs.
